name: A Purrfect Crime
description:
Breaking and entering! Petting cats! Committing crimes of the cat variety! Ever wanted to pet a cat? Ever wanted to pet ALL the cats? A Purrfect Crime is a game about breaking into peoples homes and... petting their cats! Get in, pet the cats, and get out before the homeowner notices! 

Assets used:

Guitar music

Other sounds
